settings.heading: Your health... from the inside out!

settings.text: Our all-encompassing approach of treating the Whole You starts with our team creating a customized wellness and aesthetics plan to successfully help you reach all of your goals.

settings.heading: OUR STORY
settings.title: Balanced Aesthetics' Unique Model Created For You
settings.body: Let’s be honest, Atlanta has plenty of great medical spas. You don’t need just another medspa—so we didn’t give you one. Instead, we are a one-stop-shop where you can achieve all of your wellness and aesthetic goals under the same umbrella. We are the only medspa of its kind…Balanced Aesthetics Medspa!

settings.text: We pride ourselves in providing a wide range of aesthetic and wellness services at our medspa. You will always feel warm and welcome while in our care.

settings.label: IPL Facial
settings.content: Effective facial for anti-aging and blemish control.

settings.label: Peptide Therapy
settings.content: Celebrity secret to feeling and looking young.

settings.label: Radio Frequency Microneedling
settings.content: Noninvasive and effective face and neck skin firming treatment.

settings.label: Laser Genesis
settings.content: Stimulates the skin’s natural processes to diminish the signs of aging and sun damage.

settings.label: truSculpt® Flex Muscle Toning
settings.content: See significant results after just 4 treatments.

settings.label: Botox®
settings.content: Corrects fine lines and wrinkles for a youthful appearance.

settings.label: Dermal Fillers
settings.content: Adds volume and hydration to the face for a youthful appearance.

settings.heading: SKILLED, CARING PROFESSIONALS
settings.title: BAMFAM Membership
settings.body: For only $100 per month, start your membership today and begin enjoying all of the benefits of becoming part of the BAMFAM! Receive monthly, complimentary BAM Signature Facial treatments, discounts on retail products, and more.

settings.question: Where is the office located?
settings.answer: Our office is located in the Macquarium Building at 1800 Peachtree St., Ste. 855, Atlanta, GA 30309. We validate your parking!

settings.question: Are you currently accepting new patients?
settings.answer: Yes! New patients are always welcome at our practice. We are committed to making your visits pleasant and stress-free.

settings.question: What are your payment options?
settings.answer: We are a concierge medicine facility, so we promise the best, most affordable rate. We currently do not accept insurance or HSA. Please see our packages under our services to learn how to get the biggest bang for your buck! We offer payment plans for packages and bundles.

settings.question: What sets your clinic apart from the rest?
settings.answer: Balanced Aesthetics is your one-stop shop for all of your wellness needs, from nutrition plans, peptide regimens, and HRT/TRT to advanced laser services, effective aesthetic services, and filler and neurotoxin services.

settings.question: How to submit a refill request
settings.answer:
You can:

1. Call the main office number at 470-226-2390 and let any of our team members know your first and last name, date of birth and request your refill. 

2. For After-hours requests you can leave us a voicemail with the same information and someone from our team will give you a call back to verify we received your request.

settings.question: When will I be charged for my membership?
settings.answer: All memberships are charged at the first of every month. To cancel your membership you must call the office and speak to a team member to verify your cancellation before the 1st of the month. Voicemails after hours and over the weekend will not be eligible for refunds.
